task.name: splattotable
task.shortdescription: Convert a downloaded Splatalogue spectral line list to a casa table.
task.description: This task reads a spectral line list(s) downloaded from Splatalogue (www.splatalogue.net) and loads it into a CASA table which can be queried via eg the slsearch task.

param.name: filenames
param.description:
Files containing Splatalogue lists.
The downloaded files must be in a specific format for this task to succeed. Fro details, see the splattotable task pages on CASA Docs (https://casa.nrao.edu/casadocs/)

param.name: table
param.shortdescription: Output table name. Must be specified.
param.description: Output table name. Must be specified.
